question.title: Why am I having Avoid using "px" as units; use "dp" instead in Android studio
question.body:
Avoid using "px" as units; use "dp" instead

`<TextView
android:id="@+id/welcome_message"
android:layout_width="wrap_content"
android:layout_height="wrap_content"
android:text="Welcome!"
android:textSize="150px"
android:textColor="@color/material_dynamic_primary50"
android:gravity="center"
android:layout_marginBottom="80px"
/>`

I tried using px instead of dp in android studio Java and it says Avoid using "px" as units; use "dp" instead
